About Me

My name is Ofir Mikel ,I live in a small village in the northern part of israel. I have a true passion for Frontend designing and developing. I served as a jump master, drop master and mobile app developer at the parachuting Unit of the IDF and I was awarded a certificate for being an outstanding soldier by the commander of the infantry corps on Independence day 2022.

Milu->In

Milu->In

Is a Java based app that help with sorting and listing of soldiers. the App Send Sms to the soldier on the day of his arrival and the app then can read the sms inbox file to know whether he arrived or not . The app uses two SQLite DB that created locally in your device one for the details of the soldiers and another sets the list of all the invited soldiers .

Java| Android Studio | SQL|Programming | JavaScript | Flutter | Photoshop | Figma

In this Portfolio I tried to showcase most of my programming and designing skills in one website, in the site I used Java script mostly with Three js to show the polygon sea, the camera movement and the circling images with multiple uses of math and trigonometry equations. I also used html and css to build the structure of the app and to build the explanation on each project that I made, in those cases I used mostly css grid. For all the designs I used Figma and Photoshop . The thing I wanted to showcase the most is my imagination and creativity to build portfolio un like others, but something more creative and unique.

Portfolio

Mountain Advisor

Is a flutter dart based app with a use of a rest API (credit - dbestech). The app let the user choose multiple trips and learn more about them and show them the estimated price for the trip. All with a beautiful designs and views.

ArtIfy

Is a React-Native base mobile app that sort by categories the painting and art work of the talented Vicky davilman, the app uses Firebase to save the data and for the log in.

Huge credit to Vicky davilman for the amazing artwork
